arts.ttl: Shakira RUINS Sergio Ramos' Monterrey Concacaf Champions League dream
arts.sum: Real Madrid icon Sergio Ramos â€™ hopes of landing a major continental title in North America have been ruined by pop legend Shakira. The first major challenge of the 38-year-old with his new side was a Concacaf Champions League last-16 clash against Vancouver Whitecaps.

arts.ttl: Preview: Dallas vs. Vancouver Whitecaps - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Major League Soccer clash between Dallas and Vancouver Whitecaps, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Cesar Garza craving Dundee derby repeat as drunk fans and mutual dislike fuelled family affair after Dens cup triumph
arts.sum: Tony Docherty's men grabbed the bragging rights last time out and now a huge three points is on the line for both sides
